def_cn: (阻挠议事的)冗长演说,长篇大论
def_en: A filibuster is a long slow speech made to use up time so that a vote cannot be taken and a law cannot be passed.

def_cn: 以冗长演说(或长篇大论)进行阻挠
def_en: If a politician filibusters, he or she makes a long slow speech in order to use up time so that a vote cannot be taken and a law cannot be passed.
